title: Morristown National Historical Park: Work With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us            Work With Us       GOVERNMENT JOB INFORMATION Go the the USA Jobs website for a comprehensive listing of all government jobs across the country, including any that may be open at Morristown National Historical Park.  VOLUNTEERS-IN-PARKS Volunteers for a variety of projects and activities at Morristown National Historical Park are needed for: Interpretation, giving historic house tours, conducting living history demonstrations, resource management, cultural resource management, trails crew, administrative services and many more. To inquire about these opportunities, please contact our Volunteer-In-Parks Coordinator by telephone: 973-539-2016 ext. 230, or e-mail us.  Go to the National Park Service Volunteers in Parks website for information on volunteer opportunities in National Parks across the country.
